verses.verse: Now there was a man <S%H376><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Kish, <S%H7027><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiel, <S%H22><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeror, <S%H6872><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bechorath, <S%H1064><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aphiah, <S%H647><s%> a Benjamite, <S%H1145><s%> a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of power. <S%H2428><s%>

And he had <S%H1961><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Saul, <S%H7586><s%> a choice <S%H970><s%> young <S%H970><s%> man, and a goodly: <S%H2896><s%> and there was not among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a goodlier <S%H2896><s%> person <S%H376><s%> than he: from his shoulders <S%H7926><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> he was higher <S%H1364><s%> than any <S%H3605><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the asses <S%H860><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> father <S%H1><s%> were lost. <S%H6><s%> And Kish <S%H7027><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> with you, and arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> the asses. <S%H860><s%>

And he passed <S%H5674><s%> through mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of Shalisha, <S%H8031><s%> but they found <S%H4672><s%> them not: then they passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of Shalim, <S%H8171><s%> and there they were not: and he passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of the Benjamites, <S%H1145><s%> but they found <S%H4672><s%> them not.

And when they were come <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Zuph, <S%H6689><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant <S%H5288><s%> that was with him, Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us return; <S%H7725><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> leave <S%H2308><s%> caring for the asses, <S%H860><s%> and take thought <S%H1672><s%> for us.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> there is in this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and he is an honorable <S%H3513><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he said <S%H1696><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> surely to pass: now <S%H6258><s%> let us go <S%H3212><s%> thither; <S%H8033><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> he can show <S%H5046><s%> us our way <S%H1870><s%> that we should go. <S%H1980><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> But, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if we go, <S%H3212><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall we bring <S%H935><s%> the man? <S%H376><s%> for the bread <S%H3899><s%> is spent <S%H235><s%> in our vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and there is not a present <S%H8670><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> have we?

And the servant <S%H5288><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> again, <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have <S%H4672><s%> here at hand <S%H3027><s%> the fourth <S%H7253><s%> part of a shekel <S%H8255><s%> of silver: <S%H3701><s%> that will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> us our way. <S%H1870><s%>

(Beforetime <S%H6440><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when a man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> he spoke, <S%H559><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go <S%H3212><s%> to the seer: <S%H7200><s%> for he that is now <S%H3117><s%> called a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> was beforetime <S%H6440><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> a Seer. <S%H7200><s%>)

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> Well <S%H2896><s%> said; <S%H1697><s%> come, <S%H3212><s%> let us go. <S%H3212><s%> So they went <S%H3212><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was.

And as they went <S%H5927><s%> up the hill <S%H4608><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> they found <S%H4672><s%> young <S%H5291><s%> maidens <S%H5291><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out to draw <S%H7579><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Is the seer <S%H7200><s%> here? <S%H2088><s%>

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> them, and said, <S%H559><s%> He is; behold, <S%H2009><s%> he is before <S%H6440><s%> you: make haste <S%H4116><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> for he came <S%H935><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> to the city; <S%H5892><s%> for there is a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> in the high <S%H1116><s%> place:

As soon as you be come <S%H935><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> you shall straightway <S%H3651><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> him, before <S%H2962><s%> he go <S%H5927><s%> up to the high <S%H1116><s%> place to eat: <S%H398><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> will not eat <S%H398><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he come, <S%H935><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he does bless <S%H1288><s%> the sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%> and afterwards <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they eat <S%H398><s%> that be bidden. <S%H7121><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore get <S%H5927><s%> you up; for about this time <S%H3117><s%> you shall find <S%H4672><s%> him.

And they went <S%H5927><s%> up into <S%H8432><s%> the city: <S%H5892><s%> and when they were come <S%H935><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> them, for to go <S%H5927><s%> up to the high <S%H1116><s%> place.
Now the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had told <S%H1540><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> in his ear <S%H241><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

To morrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> you a man <S%H376><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> him to be captain <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that he may save <S%H3467><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> for I have looked <S%H7200><s%> on my people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their cry <S%H6818><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to me.

And when Samuel <S%H8050><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H6030><s%> to him, Behold <S%H2009><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I spoke <S%H559><s%> to you of! this <S%H2088><s%> same <S%H2088><s%> shall reign <S%H6113><s%> over my people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> to Samuel <S%H8050><s%> in the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, where <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088><s%> the seer's <S%H7200><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> is.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I am the seer: <S%H7200><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up before <S%H6440><s%> me to the high <S%H1116><s%> place; for you shall eat <S%H398><s%> with me to day, <S%H3117><s%> and to morrow <S%H1242><s%> I will let you go, <S%H7971><s%> and will tell <S%H5046><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> that is in your heart. <S%H3824><s%>

And as for your asses <S%H860><s%> that were lost <S%H6><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ago, <S%H3117><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> not your mind <S%H3820><s%> on them; for they are found. <S%H4672><s%> And on whom <S%H4310><s%> is all <S%H3605><s%> the desire <S%H2532><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> Is it not on you, and on all <S%H3605><s%> your father's <S%H1><s%> house? <S%H1004><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Am not I a Benjamite, <S%H1145><s%> of the smallest <S%H6996><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> and my family <S%H4940><s%> the least <S%H6810><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin? <S%H1144><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> then speak <S%H1696><s%> you so <S%H1697><s%> to me?

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his servant, <S%H5288><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the parlor, <S%H3957><s%> and made <S%H5414><s%> them sit <S%H5414><s%> in the most chief <S%H7218><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> among them that were bidden, <S%H7121><s%> which were about thirty <S%H7970><s%> persons. <S%H376><s%>

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the cook, <S%H2876><s%> Bring <S%H5414><s%> the portion <S%H4490><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> you, of which <S%H834><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> to you, Set <S%H7760><s%> it by you.

And the cook <S%H2876><s%> took <S%H7311><s%> up the shoulder, <S%H7785><s%> and that which was on it, and set <S%H7760><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> Saul. <S%H7586><s%> And Samuel said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> that which is left! <S%H7604><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> you, and eat: <S%H398><s%> for to this time <S%H4150><s%> has it been kept <S%H8104><s%> for you since I said, <S%H559><s%> I have invited <S%H7121><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%> So Saul <S%H7586><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> with Samuel <S%H8050><s%> that day. <S%H3117><s%>

And when they were come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the high <S%H1116><s%> place into the city, <S%H5892><s%> Samuel communed <S%H1696><s%> with Saul <S%H7586><s%> on the top <S%H1406><s%> of the house.

And they arose <S%H7925><s%> early: <S%H7925><s%> and it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass about the spring <S%H5927><s%> of the day, <S%H7837><s%> that Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to the top <S%H1406><s%> of the house, saying, <S%H559><s%> Up, that I may send <S%H7971><s%> you away. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> out both <S%H8147><s%> of them, he and Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> abroad. <S%H2351><s%>

And as they were going <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> Bid <S%H559><s%> the servant <S%H5288><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> us, (and he passed <S%H5674><s%> on), but stand <S%H5975><s%> you still a while, <S%H3117><s%> that I may show <S%H8085><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
